topic.title: Additional Vital Signs Organizer - conformance rules

section.p: Common observations regarding the state of the patient that are not typically included in strict definitions of vital signs.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11571 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.30"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11133)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11134)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component such that it (CONF:11689)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Stroke Score (CONF:11695)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component such that it (CONF:11690)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Pain Score (CONF:11696)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11703)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Level Of Responsiveness (CONF:11697)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11691)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Blood Glucose (CONF:11698)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component such that it (CONF:11692)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Carbon Monoxide (CONF:11699)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11693)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Carbon Dioxide (CONF:11700)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component such that it (CONF:11694)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Rhythm (CONF:11714)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11708)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer, where its type is Glasgow Coma Score Organizer (CONF:11709)
contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11133)
contain exactly one [1..1] datatypes:statusCode

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11134)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component such that it (CONF:11689)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Stroke Score (CONF:11695)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component such that it (CONF:11690)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Pain Score (CONF:11696)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11703)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Level Of Responsiveness (CONF:11697)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11691)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Blood Glucose (CONF:11698)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component such that it (CONF:11692)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Carbon Monoxide (CONF:11699)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11693)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Carbon Dioxide (CONF:11700)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component such that it (CONF:11694)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Rhythm (CONF:11714)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11708)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer, where its type is Glasgow Coma Score Organizer (CONF:11709)

body.codeblock: <organizer classCode="CLUSTER" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.30" extension="2022-01-01"/> <statusCode/> <component> <organizer classCode="CLUSTER" moodCode="SLOT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.170" extension="2022-01-01"/> <statusCode/> <component> <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.160" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="9267-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Glasgow coma score.eye opening"/> <value xsi:type="INT"/> </observation> </component> </organizer> </component> </organizer>
